entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then becoming west 20 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
